strapiPost.title: Vittoria Industries Moving Headquarters To Bentonville
strapiPost.content:
Vittoria Industries, a bicycle tire and tube manufacturer, is moving its North American headquarters to Bentonville. 

  • Biking buddies: Vittoria will set up offices in the Ledger, the world’s first bikable building. Making a great neighbor, Specialized is opening an experience center in the Ledger as well. 
  • Good neighbors: The company will occupy a 1,250-sq-ft office space as well as a 1,000-sq-ft retail kiosk in the lobby, and Vittoria plans to provide free tire services and tune-ups for every tenant in the building.

Read more about Vittoria’s plans HERE.
